word:
In the answer of the lawyer the whole duty of man is presented in a few words. On these two principles, love to God and love to man, hang all the law and the prophets. The first four of the ten commandments are summed up in the one great precept, "Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart." 
                                                                           1793
The last six are included in the other, "Thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself."
